extension.name: members
extension.description: Define your own frontend membership system using events and XSLT.

releases.release: * Update for Symphony 2.3 * Lazy load member fields for better performance * Added Greek translation
* Fix update script in 1.1 * Explicitly set the CHARSET to be UTF8 when creating new tables.

* member: Username uniqueness is now done by `handle`, rather than `value` * member: Activation and member: Role UI has been updated to better show a member's role while they are unactivated * Fix sorting and output parameter of the member: Activation field * The member: Reset Password event now works correctly with the member: Email field when no member: Username field is present * Addition of the Italian localisation * Other minor miscellaneous tweaks and fixes
